name: Redirect username
author: Artem Sannikov

sections.description:
Plugin “Redirect username” does not allow to know the login site administrator via the url address type http://example.ru/?author=1.

P.S: If you have any suggestions on how to improve the plugin, please send email to info[@]artemsannikov.ru

Tags

login, admin, administrator, user, redirect, home, page, site, author, editor, username, hidden, hide, wordpress, wp, wordpress login, wordpress username, home page, security
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin “Redirect username” to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory;
  2. Activate the plugin “Redirect username” through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq: Visit the site http://artemsannikov.ru/plugins/redirect-username for help. Questions please leave in comments.

screenshots.caption: Plugin Redirect username - When you open the URL - "http://example.ru/?author=1" the plugin will automatically redirect you to the home page of your website.
Redirection to the home page of your site is successful
